Package com.atakmap.android.importfiles.task

Class ImportRemoteFileTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.String,​ImportFileTask.ProgressUpdate,​ImportFileTask.Result>
      • com.atakmap.android.importfiles.task.ImportFileTask
        • com.atakmap.android.importfiles.task.ImportRemoteFileTask
  • public class ImportRemoteFileTask
extends ImportFileTask
    Background task to import a single file, minor extensions to ImportFileTask e.g. update the RemoteResource configuration once downloaded, and different method of notifying user
